metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46849 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Using the --fragment option in certain configuration setups OpenVPN version 2.6.0 to 2.6.6 allows an attacker to trigger a divide by zero behaviour which could cause an application crash, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
